post.summary: Log in and receive an access token
Log out the current user (revoke tokens)

get.summary: List recipes for a given category
List favorites for current user (admins see all)

post.summary: Add a recipe to the current user's favorites (users only)

delete.summary: Remove a favorite (only the owner, role=user)

403.description: Only users can delete favorites / You can only delete your own favorites

get.description: Proxies the Keto Diet API categories endpoint.

get.summary: List keto recipes by category (RapidAPI - Keto Diet)
get.description: Proxies the Keto Diet API root endpoint with a 'category' query (e.g., /?category=2).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category ID from Keto Diet API (e.g., 2)

get.summary: List recipes with filters and pagination
Search recipes by general query with optional sorting and pagination

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search across title, description, ingredients, instructions, and category name

get.summary: Export all recipes as CSV (streamed download)
Get all favorites of a specific user (Admin only)
get.description: Returns a list of all favorites for the given user ID. Accessible only to admins.

200.description: List of favorites for the user

403.description: Only admins can view user favorites

error.example: Only admins can view user favorites
